text: @atrupar @DebbieSVA Those idiots that feel that a mask are a hindrance or a safety health issue, let them not wear one BUT when they get sick with COVID-19 they shouldn’t be allowed to go to the hospital.  Let them call President Trump and have him take care of them. And he’ll say I never said that!
